item.title: Mocking Classes With Real Time Facades
item.description: In PHP, particularly within frameworks like Laravel, facades provide a static-like interface to classes available in the service container. Here, we delve into the concept of real-time facades, which allow you to treat any class in your application as if it were a facade, enhancing your ability to mock dependencies for testing.
